title: Odyssey Universe and Lore
body: Provides hilarious bios and a short story about Kayn in this universe.

replies.body:
So in a roundabout sort of way, they DID give (a version of) Rhaast a bio.
Fantastic.

See? We do listen ;-)

(Also, my deflections of direct questions are often like "We are doing the thing you're asking about, in some way, but I can't talk about it...")

> See? We do listen ;-)
> 
> (Also, my deflections of direct questions are often like "We are doing the thing you're asking about, in some way, but I can't talk about it...")

Is Odyssey part of any existing universe? Odyssey Kayn seems to hint that Event Horizon is part of the same universe, but I was also wondering about Steel Valkyries.

I can confirm that we have deliberately built Odyssey to be part of the same universe as at least 2 other settings.

I should not confirm which, as they could be spoilers.

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AxXTTOG8,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2018-09-12T02:29:48.770+0000)
>
> I can confirm that we have deliberately built Odyssey to be part of the same universe as at least 2 other settings.
> 
> I should not confirm which, as they could be spoilers.

I'm thinking maybe Dreadnova and maybe Galactic (also GGMF, but not sure they're lines), they all feel like more grounded space skins as opposed to the cosmic scale stuff like dark star has.
If you listen to Kayn's interactions Rhaast will reveal one (maybe two) skin line that Odyssey is connected to.

> If you listen to Kayn's interactions Rhaast will reveal one (maybe two) skin line that Odyssey is connected to.


Event Horizon is definitely one of them. I'm betting on Steel Valkyries being the second. Star Guardian is already a confirmed no (especially because Jinx is already a part of that). Super Galaxy is a slight possibility, but Steel Valkyries seems to match Odyssey's tone much more.

Will you guys eventually reveal which universes are connected and put all the lores together? :D
The most obvious one I was talking about was Dark Star.

> [{quoted}](name=Eternal791,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AxXTTOG8,comment-id=000000010000000100000000,timestamp=2018-09-12T04:58:41.898+0000)

> The most obvious one I was talking about was Dark Star.

Well of course, but Dark Star is one part of Event Horizon.
Nope, Dark Star & Cosmic don't share the same universe as Odyssey.
Yasuo's Song and Space Lizard are the highlight of this for me. I don't laugh out loud often, but that got me.
